channel.title: Mani Rao on The Bombay Literary Magazine
channel.description: Recent content in Mani Rao on The Bombay Literary Magazine

item.title: Three poems
item.description: Writing on the Wall On the heels of the siren A hissing undertow Back-bending sea-oats Palm fronds frisked Static in the aquarium White knuckles on the horizon surely higher than our roof Horseshoes hung down on the beach Will cavalry recede _ _ Between magnet shore and magnet moon Wonâ€™t ocean float Sorry fish so sorry garden A fist mounted the ocean and scrawled on the promenade: Equality No Souvenir
